issue.title: [C++] Determine desirable maximum length for ExecBatch in pipelined and parallel execution of kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8898](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8898). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Maximum lengths like 16K or 64K seem to be popular, but we should write our own benchmarks so that we can justify the choice of default chunksize
